description.content: Create a new category and return it.
Delete a category if it exists.
List items, optionally including out-of-stock ones.
Export current items to an Excel sheet.
Import items from an uploaded Excel sheet.
Fetch a single item by ID.
Update an item; price changes are staged as pending.
Attach an image to an item by saving the uploaded file.
Authenticate using username/password and return a JWT.
Authenticate using a short numeric PIN.
Endpoint accessible to high-privilege roles only.
Added as a part of security scheme: oauth2
Added as a part of security scheme: oauth2
Return all orders across tables for staff views.
Mark an order line as accepted.
Mark an order line as rejected.
Return all tables and their statuses.

Add an item to a table's cart.

Multiple guests may add items concurrently by specifying a ``guest_id``.
Move all cart items to the order, locking them from guest edits.
Allow an admin to soft-cancel an order line by setting ``quantity`` to 0.
Staff directly place an order for a guest without a phone.
Return the running bill for a table.
Settle the current bill and clear outstanding orders.
Queue a staff call request for the given table.
Lock a table after settlement until cleaned.
Mark a table as cleaned and ready for new guests.
Begin magic-link login and email a one-time token.
Redeem a magic link token and return a session JWT.
Return menu categories and items for guests with caching and ETag support.
Create a new order for ``table_token`` within the tenant context.

Generate an invoice for a dining session.

This endpoint currently acts as a stub; the database wiring to resolve
``table_token`` and persist invoices will be added later. ``payload`` may
include an optional ``tip`` amount which is added after tax.
Return menu categories and items for the counter.
Return menu categories and items for hotel rooms with ETag and caching.
Return a PDF (or HTML fallback) for ``invoice_id``.
Create an onboarding session and return its identifier.

Return a printable KOT for ``order_id``.

Tries counter, table and room orders in that sequence. Falls back to
returning HTML when WeasyPrint is unavailable.
Return active orders for the KDS queue view.
Mark an order item as accepted.
Mark an order item as ready.
Mark an order item as served.
Mark an order item as rejected.
Update status and generate an 80mm invoice when delivered.
Added as a part of security scheme: oauth2
Added as a part of security scheme: oauth2

Toggle the out-of-stock status of a menu item.

Returns an empty payload on success.

Persist multiple queued orders for ``tenant_id``.

The batch is limited to 20 orders to bound request sizes.
Create a JSON backup for ``tenant_id`` and return the file path.
Return a daily owner daybook in PDF or HTML format.
Return a daily Z-report for ``date`` in CSV format.

Return a GST-aware monthly CSV for ``month``.

``gst_mode`` determines the output format:
``reg`` (regular), ``comp`` (composition) or ``unreg`` (unregistered).
Send the KPI digest for ``tenant_id`` on ``date``.
Added as a part of security scheme: oauth2
Added as a part of security scheme: oauth2
Return a ZIP bundle of invoices, payments and z-report rows.
Authenticate a staff member using ``code`` and ``pin``.
Set a new PIN for ``staff_id`` and clear login throttling.
